website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch golf swing trainer that you can use indoors or outdoors.
pros: Delivers immediate tactile feedback to help you maintain spine angle during swing
Intended for golfers of all skill levels and ages

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but extremely beneficial.
customer_reviews.text: It gets the fifth star because of the sheer value of this training technique. But it sincerely deserves only 4 stars, the price is about $75 to high. With that being said, this device has multiple ways it can help you to improve your golf swing. It takes a little practice and repetition to get quick results. If you invest time into learning the right lessons, you’ll take 5 strokes off your game or more. It’s a must have for me and I’d recommend it to anyone like me who self teaches and any golf instructors. This is a great device! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf training aid
customer_reviews.text: The Pro-Head Golf Trainer is an awesome piece of training equipment. I’ve used it for maintaining head position and for hip position. It’s very easy to set up and use. It’s light weight and is easy to move around. If you are having trouble with lifting your head or rising up to soon with your hips (over the top swing) this training aid can help you.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Auferoth

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a very helpful tool.
customer_reviews.text: Initial set up and practice seems very good. Set up was pretty easy I do need to get some weight on the base as they recommended. Feels strange getting used to not moving your head but a lot of clean contact. Looking forward to some lower numbers this spring.
customer_reviews.author: DLW

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this item does what it advertises. I purchased the portable model. By using it, I noticed with impact tape that I was more consistent in striking the sweet spot. It could be a bit better quality though, it's not as stable as I would like. It's easy assembly. Overall, I think it's a helpful device.
customer_reviews.author: Wil M.

customer_reviews.title: Complicated
customer_reviews.text: Not well made. I had to redesign in order to somewhat work
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like this product
customer_reviews.text: Wrong assembly instructions included with the product. Called and was told he would email the correct instructions, which he did. They did not work well either if you wanted to use all three positions. Golfer must turn 180 degrees to use in the hip position instead of the head position, which requires a lot more room if you are using this indoors. "Hat" was a joke.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: This is designed to keep your head straight however the bolts and screws that come with this are still very loose. My head is still able to move around pretty freely. Definitely does not work as it is intended too, would not recommend to anyone. The wall mounted version might work better but as of now I would never buy the portable one, it simply does not work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle "Bobby" Bogart

customer_reviews.title: One of the best golf instruction tools with Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy set up. I couldn’t believe how easy the instructions were and how I set it up in no time!! My son and my husband use this. One of the best golf instructional tools around. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Glasband

customer_reviews.title: This is a great device. I use it all of the time ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device. I use it all of the time and for every shot in the book. I absolutely love it. I'd give it 6 Stars if I could. Yes I am a real person and this is a real review.
customer_reviews.author: AWP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy and it does exactly what is says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Meow

customer_reviews.title: Effective training aid
customer_reviews.text: Great at providing immediate feedback to maintain head position and posture through the swing.
customer_reviews.author: M Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid
customer_reviews.text: So many amateurs raise up their head during swing, and I've been guilty of it for years. I've tried plenty of golf training aids through the years, but nothing beats this one. It keeps your head down, and everything else automatically lines up. Major moment for my golf swing. Granted, it's pricey - I actually picked it up on eBay and saved a little - but well worth it even for the price on Amazon. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great product! East to assembled
customer_reviews.text: Great product! East to assembled. Took 5 strokes off my game like the star power it has. It has allowed me to get repetition of my new and improved swing!! fast delivery and response by seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene clark

customer_reviews.title: Pro-Head is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling with my driver for a long time because I was always moving my head up. This product has improved my swing and game drastically.
customer_reviews.author: D Smith

product_meta.title: PRO-HEAD Golf Trainer - Golf Swing Training Aid & Correcting Tool for a Straighter and Farther Shot - Practice Indoor & Outdoor - Instant Improvement
feature_bullets: ★ THE ONLY STEADY HEAD AND SPINE ANGLE SWING TRAINER ON THE MARKET - Backed up by over 20 years of research and development, the PH2T is proven to be the MOST ADVANCED and COMPLETE golf trainer available. Unique and patented design, engineered by golf industry professionals and endorsed by PGA Teachers of the Year Martin Hall, Lou Guzzi and other top coaches and pros. You get professional quality and long-term durability with a complete 2-year warranty.

★ DESIGNED FOR INSTANT SWING IMPROVEMENT - Start training today and immediately get the feel of staying down with a steady head. The Pro Head 2 Trainer will help you to maintain your spine angle and keep your head behind the ball through impact. This swing training aid offers instant tactile feedback, which helps the brain to develop the motor and muscle memory to break common faulty swing habits. Follow the included exercise guide for faster results and impress your playing partners.

★ PERFECT FOR ALL SKILL LEVELS AND AGES - Whether you are a beginner or an advanced golfer, this personal all-in one trainer is ideal for all skill levels (single digit handicap to 25 and higher), all ages, kids and adults, men and women, all body builds, right and left handed players. The ProHead 2 easily adjusts to any height and body weight. Suitable for practicing alone, or with an instructor or teacher.

★ ONLY 5 MINUTES TO SET UP - EASY TO MOVE - The tool and instructions included will help you to set up the PH2T in minutes. Once set up, there is no need to fully disassemble it. The ballast base can be filled with water or sand at the location, or use the included sand bag. Built-in wheels facilitate easy movement to relocate your training place.

★ TRAIN INDOOR OR OUTDOOR ALL YEAR AROUND - Practice your swing with or without a golf club or hitting balls. Break your faulty swing habits! Strike the ball like a pro! Add this amazing and proven trainer to your cart NOW!
